# Installing R
#### All versions of RStudio requires users to have R downloaded on before running RStudio. 
  * It can be downloaded here: https://cran.rstudio.com/
  * Choose the appropriate opperating system: 
    + For Mac Users: Choose the R-3.6.0.pkg and follow installation directions 
      - The following installation screen should appear. Press continue until the every end of the installation process. 
      
      ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/R_Installation_Mac_1.png){width=75%}
      - Installation is complete when you see this image You can remove installation files to the trash after this step. 
      
      ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/R_Installation_Mac_2.png){width=75%}
    + For PC Users: Click on **Download R for Windows**, then base (to download R for this first time), and finally **Download R 3.6.0 for Windows**

# Installing RStudio
#### Go to this link https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download
  * Scroll down to the Installers for Supported Platforms  and choose the appropriate opperating system: 
  ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/RStudio_Installation_1.png){width=75%}
  
    + For Mac Users: Choose **RStudio 1.2.1335 - Mac OS X 10.12+ (64-bit)**
      - Move RStudio to Applications folder 
    + For PC Users: Choose **RStudio 1.2.1335 - Windows 7+ (64-bit)**

# Installing LaTeX 
#### For Mac Users:
* Download MacTeX from this link (it is recommended to download with Safari) :  http://www.tug.org/mactex/mactex-download.html
  + This package is rather larger (3.9 Gb)  and will take some time to download, install, and get set up. 
  + Do **not** download smaller BasicTeX package 
  

#### For PC Users:
* Download MiKTeX from this link : https://miktex.org/download
  + Choose the **Howto: Install MikTeX on your Windows computer**
  + Press the Download icon at the bottom and the file will immediately begin downloading
    ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC.png){width=75%}
  + Click on the file at the bottom of your web browser and start the installation by pressing **Run**
  ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_2.png){width=75%}
  + After following the on screen instructions, you will need to choose your settings. **Make sure to set Install missing packages on-the-fly to Yes** 
![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_3.png){width=75%}
  + You will be redirected to this screen and make sure to continue to press **Next** and follow the on-screen directions until the installation procress finishes. 
![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_4.png){width=75%}

* If you need to uninstall MiKTeX, restart your computer, 

A helpful link: https://medium.com/@sorenlind/create-pdf-reports-using-r-r-markdown-latex-and-knitr-on-windows-10-952b0c48bfa9

After installing R, RStudio, and your version of LaTeX, please proceed to the RStudio video.
